---
title: "Penguin Dashboards"
format: dashboard
---

```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(plotly)
library(janitor)

penguins <- read_csv("data/penguins_lter.csv")

penguins <- penguins %>%
  clean_names()
```

## Row 1

```{r}
p <- ggplot(penguins, aes(species, culmen_length_mm )) +
  geom_boxplot()
  
ggplotly(p)
```

```{r}
p <- ggplot(penguins, aes(culmen_length_mm, culmen_depth_mm, color = island)) +
  geom_point()
ggplotly(p)
```

## Row 2

```{r}
penguins <- penguins %>%
  select(-c(comments, sex, body_mass_g))

knitr::kable(penguins) 
```
